title: S.P.L.A.S.H.
creator_credit: Michael Mills, Judy LeGros and ONF | NFB
brief_description: This fast-paced and entertaining animated film is about water and the demands placed on our waterways by agriculture, industry, and urban life. An army of droplets, led by The Chief, shows what happens to water from the time it falls as rain until it reaches its destination.
